"
PTO
Parent Resources for the Common Core

p.span: By order of the Governor, all schools in NYS are closed until April 15. As that date gets closer, the Governor will re-evaluate whether that closure should be extended. We will update you on school closures and other COVID-19 related information as it becomes available. As always, thank you for your patience, understanding and flexiblity in this ever-changing situation.
For any specific questions, please email Superintendent Jason Mitchell at info@madisoncentralny.org.

Childcare is available locally for children of employees considered "essential." If you believe you may qualify, please call the Oneida Herkimer Madison Child Care Resource Center at 315-223-7850 x. 222.

span.a: You can also click this link for child care survey.

span.br: Upstate University Hospital’s COVID-19 Triage Line:

span.em: This line is for Central New York residents to call if they have questions about COVID-19, are showing possible symptoms, or if they may have had exposure to someone diagnosed with a positive case of COVID-19. ​If you do not have a primary care doctor or are uninsured, call 315-464-3979​ 24 hours a day.
